statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPAPIConfig)<-[:HAS_CONFIG]-(:GCPAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP API Gateway API Configs that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPAPIConfig)<-[r:HAS_CONFIG]-(:GCPAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP API Gateway API Configs to APIS relationships that are out of date
